Content: Everybody in the world needs to do this. Everybody in the world needs to see. It was unbelieveable. Unbelieveable. I mean, the little things, the weightlessness. But to see the blue color go whip by, and now you're staring into blackness. That's the thing... And there's something you shoot through, and all of a sudden, as though you whip a sheet off you when you're asleep, and you're looking into blackness, into black ugliness. And you look down. There's the blue down there and black up there. And there is mother Earth and comfort. And up there... is that death? I don't know.
Author: William Shatner
